title: Overview: Hybrid OA data
text: Hybrid Journals listed Open Access Monitor. Data gathered https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM enriched ISSN variants. Number investigated journals: 5573 agreement
code: oam_hybrid_jns #> # A tibble: 10,472 × 4 #>    agreement  lead          cr_journal_id issn      #>    <chr>      <chr>                 <dbl> <chr>     #>  1 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         70719 0306-0322 #>  2 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         70719 1865-8717 #>  3 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         76998 0003-5696 #>  4 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         76998 1613-0421 #>  5 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        304322 1438-2091 #>  6 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        304322 1868-9426 #>  7 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         75760 0232-8461 #>  8 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         75760 2196-6761 #>  9 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        124445 0003-6390 #> 10 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        124445 2156-7093 #> # … with 10,462 more rows oam_hybrid_jns %>%   group_by(agreement, lead) %>%   summarise(journals = n_distinct(cr_journal_id)) %>%   arrange(desc(journals)) #> `summarise()` has grouped output by 'agreement'. You can override using the #> `.groups` argument. #> # A tibble: 20 × 3 #> # Groups:   agreement [19] #>    agreement       lead          journals #>    <chr>           <chr>            <int> #>  1 Springer Hybrid DEAL              2092 #>  2 Wiley Hybrid    DEAL              1404 #>  3 Sage            BSB                972 #>  4 CUP             BSB                332 #>  5 TaylorFrancis   ZBW                246 #>  6 De Gruyter      SUB Göttingen      104 #>  7 Karger          BSB                 71 #>  8 De Gruyter      ZBW                 63 #>  9 ACM             hebis               59 #> 10 IOP             TIB                 56 #> 11 RSC             TIB                 37 #> 12 Nature          MPDL                35 #> 13 BMJ             BSB                 28 #> 14 Hogrefe         SUB Göttingen       28 #> 15 AIP             TIB                 27 #> 16 SPIE            TIB                  9 #> 17 Portland Press  TIB                  5 #> 18 Thieme 2        ZB MED               4 #> 19 ECS             TIB                  2 #> 20 Thieme 1        ZB MED               1

title: Authors and Citation
text: Najko Jahn. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jahn N (2022). hoaddata: Data hybrid open access journal publishing. https://subugoe.github.io/hoaddata, https://github.com/subugoe/hoaddata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {hoaddata: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing},   author = {Najko Jahn},   year = {2022},   note = {https://subugoe.github.io/hoaddata, https://github.com/subugoe/hoaddata}, }

what: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: package contains information open access uptake hybrid journals. journals belong national transformative agreements Germany listed Open Access Monitor. main purpose hoaddata ship data hybrid open access monitoring dashboards, currently development SUB Göttingen support Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft. providing data R package, hoaddata can also used data analytics tasks R. Data cover publication period 2017 - 2022.

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: can install hoaddata GitHub :

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: package provides following data tables.

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: ?oam_hybrid_jns: Hybrid Journals listed Open Access Monitor. Data gathered https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM, validated enriched ISSN variants. ?cc_jn_ind: Prevalence Creative Commons license variants year hybrid journal obtained Crossref. ?cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind: First author country affiliations per journal, year Creative Commons license.

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: ?cc_openalex_inst: Article-level affiliation data first authors obtained OpenAlex. Covers open access articles Creative Commons license hybrid journal.

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: data-raw folder contains code used generate hoaddata datasets. data obtained interfacing subugoe-collaborative scholarly data warehouse, collection big scholarly datasets hosted Google Big Query maintained SUB Göttingen. Crossref used determining publication volume articles provided CC license, affiliation data gathered OpenAlex. can find corresponding SQL code inst/sql/ folder. data package automatically build GitHub Actions. merge event main branch triggers data update calling scripts data-raw/ folder. Data changes incorporated package tracked Git. makes easy update reproduce different version data contained hoaddata.

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: Datasets released public domain. Anyone free copy, modify, publish, use, compile, sell, distribute materials form, purpose, commercial non-commercial, means. Crossref asserts claims ownership individual items bibliographic metadata associated Digital Object Identifiers (DOIs) acquired use Crossref Free Services. Individual items bibliographic metadata associated DOIs may cached incorporated user’s content systems. OpenAlex data made available CC0 license. work re-used following dataset: Pollack, Philipp; Lindstrot, Barbara; Barbers, Irene, Stanzel, Franziska, 2021, “Open Access Monitor: Zeitschriftenlisten (V2)”, https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM. published CC 4.0.

what: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — cc_jn_ind
title: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — cc_jn_ind
text: dataset contains number proportion articles Creative Commons license (CC) license variant year hybrid journals listed German Open Access monitor since 2017.

title: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — cc_jn_ind
Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — cc_jn_ind
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 43752 rows 6 columns.

title: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — cc_jn_ind
text: Journal's article volume calculated using Crossref database snapshot. Note articles published regular issues aside supplements containing conference contributions like meeting abstracts, indicated non-numeric pagination included. Also, non-scholarly journal content, table contents excluded, following Unpaywall's paratext recognition approach, expanded include patterns indicating corrections. CC licenses also identified Crossref metadata records. License information author accepted manuscripts ("aam") considered. Variables: cr_journal_id Crossref journal ID cr_year Earliest publication year (Crossref field `issued`) cc Normalized Creative Commons variant. Ordered factor license variant permissiveness cc_total Number articles Creative Commons variant jn_all Yearly journal output prop Proportion CC licensed articles

title: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — cc_jn_ind

what: Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_openalex_inst
title: Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_openalex_inst
text: dataset comprises affiliation information first authors open access article published hybrid journals listed oam_hybrid_jns.

title: Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_openalex_inst
Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_openalex_inst
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 358726 rows 7 columns.

title: Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_openalex_inst
text: first author often considered lead author(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lead_author) usually undertaken research presented article, although author roles can vary across disciplines. used OpenAlex data source determining lead author's affiliation. case OpenALEX record country affiliation, extracted country names display_name using regular expressions. Variables: doi DOI OA article cr_journal_id Crossref journal ID cr_year Earliest publication year (Crossref field `issued`) cc Normalized Creative Commons variant. country_code country institution located, represented ISO two-letter country code. (OpenAlex field `country_code` extra country extraction) id OpenAlex ID institution display_name primary name institution (OpenAlex field `display_name`) knowledge, OpenAlex provide information corresponding  authors affiliation.

title: First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license — cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind
text: dataset contains number proportion open access articles hybrid journals country, year Creative Commons license variant.

title: First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license — cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind
First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license — cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 639293 rows 6 columns.

title: First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license — cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind
text: Country affiliations determined using first author affiliation listed OpenAlex. first author often considered lead author(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lead_author) usually undertaken research presented article, although author roles can vary across disciplines. Note whole counting every original article review counted per country affiliation first authors used. first authors can multiple affiliations different countries, please use cc_jn_ind determine journal's publication volume. Variables: cr_journal_id Crossref journal ID cr_year Earliest publication year (Crossref field `issued`) country_code country institution located, represented ISO two-letter country code. (OpenAlex field `country_code`) cc Normalized Creative Commons variant. NA represents articles, provided CC license articles_under_cc_variant Number articles Creative Commons variant, grouped journal, year country affiliation articles_total Yearly journal output year country affiliation

Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor — oam_hybrid_jns
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 10798 rows 4 columns.

title: Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor — oam_hybrid_jns
text: Pollack, Philipp; Lindstrot, Barbara; Barbers, Irene, Stanzel, Franziska 2022, Open Access Monitor: Zeitschriftenlisten (v2) https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM

title: Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor — oam_hybrid_jns
text: direct data exchange Crossref ISSN agency. Instead, publishers register journal-level metadata first deposit metadata given journal, including ISSN(s). Crossref makes sure article journal metadata match. info Crossref's handling ISSN registration can found support thread: https://community.crossref.org/t/parallel-titles---given-issn/2183 Variables: agreement Transformative agreement German consortium lead Institution leading nationwide consortium cr_journal_id Crossref journal ID issn International Standard Serial Number (ISSN), ID refer specific journal's media version
